start.text: You think there's a cold beer for us at the end of all this?
I'd like to get my hands on the guy responsible for this mess.
Looks like we're in for a long day today.
This area just doesn't feel right.

start_boss.text: I have a bad feeling about this.
Okay, why not? Didn't want to die alone anyway.

retreat.text: Let's get the hell out of here.
Roger that. Let's run like hell.

engaged.text: End of the line for you.

pursuing.text: I'll bet that stings a bit.
It's okay, $playerHonorific, I can take him!

running.text: I'll be happy to survive this with all my parts.
Maybe help is on its way, but I'm not waiting around for it.

hull_90.text: Heh, you're gonna wish you hadn't done that.
Took a little damage, but I can make it.

hull_50.text: Any idea how many of our crew have died?
Well, I got hit pretty hard.

hull_30.text: It can't get any worse than this, can it?
Sorry, $playerHonorific, but I can't take much more of this.

death.text: I wish it hadn't come to this.

victory.text: Hey, catch me later, I'll buy you a beer.
So, you think there's a future for us at the end all of this?
